templateName: Selected Date Range With Input Parameter for Text

parameters.description: Select from your data model a date column for the measure
Enter the text phrase that you want to use for this measure

encoding.name: Selected Date Range
encoding.description: A text value that shows the selected date range

instructions: 1. Select a Date Column from your data model
description: This going to create a measure where you can select a Date Column and the measure will write a text phase about the range of dates selected by the user.
